import React from 'react' export default function BasketDetails() { let basket = useSelector(state=>state.basket); return (
Детали заказа
Количество товара: {' '+Array.from(basket.values()) .reduce((acm, item)=>acm+basket .get(item), 0)}
Итого: {' '+Array.from(basket.values()) .reduce((acm, item)=>acm+basket .get(item)*item.price, 0)} ₽
) }
